description:
• If you are itching to write (or finish) an eBook so you can establish yourself as an authority in your field or industry, this course is for you.
  • If you need/want something that you can email to people interested in learning from you for free (or not for free) so they can get to know more about your knowledge and skillset, this course is for you.
  • If you want to self publish an eBook on Amazon Kindle, this course is for you.
  • If you have started and stopped the process of writing an eBook more than 1x because you don't know what to do and the process feels too massive or complicated, this course is for you.

The goal of this course is take your predetermined topic and write a non-fiction eBook quickly and easily.

There are 24 lectures totaling 2+ hours of video in this course!

This is the exact process that I followed to write and publish 6 non-fiction eBooks to date.
title: How I Write An eBook In 1 Day With No Fancy Tools or Tricks
